description: Lead development on end-to-end features in a full-stack telecommunication system. This includes gathering requirements, API design, and implementation across back-end and front-end architectures.
Contributed to the development of a full-stack telecommunication system. The application utilizes a Vue.js and Typescript front end, and both Java and Golang microservices for the back end.
Developed systems in Golang to simplify operations for investment managers.
Collaborated with a client to develop a trading algorithm for a specific commodity.
